AT.name: Costume Quest 2
AT.description: Spiele in „Costume Quest 2“, dem fantastischen Nachfolger des Originalspielhits „Costume Quest“ von Double Fine, der Fans aller Altersstufen in von Süßigkeiten besessene Kreuzritter verwandelt hat, „Süßes oder Saures“ mit Zahnsoldaten und kämpfe gegen sie. Dieses wundervolle Rollenspielabenteuer besitzt eine Reihe neuer Merkmale und Funktionen sowie Verbesserungen des Spielablaufs, um den Schabernack noch zu verdoppeln. Erkunde gespenstische zeitlose Landschaften, ziehe bezaubernde neue Kostüme an, die dich in mächtige Hallo-Krieger verwandeln, und sammle noch gruseligere Halloween-Karten, um sie im Kampf gegen eine Legion von Bösewichten einzusetzen, die von Zahnhygiene besessen sind. Nur die heldenhaften Geschwister Wren und Reynold können Halloween für alle Zeiten retten!

AU.name: Costume Quest 2
AU.description: Trick, treat and pick a fight with villianous dental soldiers in Costume Quest 2, the sweet sequel to Double Fine’s hit original, Costume Quest, that turned fans of all ages into candy obsessed crusaders. This inspired RPG adventure includes a range of new features and gameplay improvements to double the amount of mischievous fun. Explore spooky time-traversing landscapes, don adorable new costumes that transform into powerful Hallo-warriors, and collect even Creepier Treat Cards to wield in combat against a legion of hygiene obsessed baddies. Only heroic siblings Wren and Reynold can save Halloween forever!

BG.name: Costume Quest 2
BG.description: Trick, treat and pick a fight with villainous dental soldiers in Costume Quest 2, the sweet sequel to Double Fine’s hit original, Costume Quest, that turned fans of all ages into candy obsessed crusaders. Explore spooky time-traversing landscapes, don adorable new costumes that transform into powerful Hallo-warriors, and collect even Creepier Treat Cards to wield in combat against a legion of hygiene obsessed baddies. Only heroic siblings Wren and Reynold can save Halloween forever!

BE.name: Costume Quest 2
BE.description: Faites des farces, mangez des bonbons et combattez de méchants soldats dentaires dans Costume Quest 2, la suite sucrée du succès de Double Fine, Costume Quest, qui a transformé les fans de tous âges en croisés obsédés par les sucreries. Ce jeu de rôle-aventure débridé inclut un éventail de nouvelles fonctionnalités et d'améliorations de l'expérience de jeu pour doubler la somme de malice et d'amusement. Explorez des paysages effrayants au fil du temps, revêtez d'adorables nouveaux costumes vous transformant en puissants Hallo-guerriers, et récupérez des cartes de Bonbons Farceurs encore plus horribles pour les employer contre une légion de vilains obsédés par l'hygiène. Seuls les jumeaux héroïques Wren et Reynold peuvent sauver Halloween pour toujours !

ES.name: Costume Quest 2
ES.description: Truco, trato... y busca camorra con unos malvados soldados dentales en Costume Quest 2, la nueva y dulce entrega del aclamado juego original de Double Fine Costume Quest que transformó a fans de todas las edades en cruzados obsesionados por los dulces. Esta aventura de inspiración RPG incluye un montón de nuevas aventuras y mejoras en la dinámica de juego para duplicar la cantidad de diversión y travesuras. Explora espeluznantes paisajes extemporáneos, viste nuevos y encantadores disfraces que se convierten en poderosos guerreros de Halloween y recoge tarjetas de trato aún más escalofriantes para combatir contra una legión de villanos obsesionados con la higiene. ¡Solo los heroicos hermanos Wren y Reynold podrán salvar Halloween para siempre!

IT.name: Costume Quest 2
IT.description: Dolcetti, scherzetti e lotte contro malvagi soldati orali in Costume Quest 2, il dolce sequel dell'amato gioco di Double Fine, Costume Quest, che ha trasformato fan di tutte le età in paladini ossessionati dai dolci! Quest'avventura ispirata ai RPG include un ventaglio di nuove funzionalità e miglioramenti di gioco che raddoppiano il divertimento. Esplora spettrali paesaggi senza tempo, indossa nuovi, adorabili costumi che ti trasformano in un potente Hallo-guerriero, e raccogli Figurine di Dolcetti da brivido per combattere contro una legione di cattivi ossessionati dall'igiene. Solo gli eroici fratelli Wren e Reynold possono salvare la festa di Halloween!

NL.name: Costume Quest 2
NL.description: Ga het gevecht aan met meedogenloze tandsoldaatjes in Costume Quest 2, het suikerzoete vervolg op Double Fine's kaskraker Costume Quest dat fans van alle leeftijden veranderde in door snoep geobsedeerde kruisvaarders. Dit RPG-avontuur bevat tal van nieuwe functies en gameplayverbeteringen voor nóg meer ondeugend speelplezier. Verken spookachtige landschappen, trek schattige kostuums aan die in machtige Hallo-krijgers veranderen en verzamel Creepier Treat Cards om de strijd aan te binden met door hygiëne geobsedeerde slechteriken. Alleen de heldhaftige broers Wren en Reynold kunnen Halloween voor eeuwig en altijd redden!

NZ.name: Costume Quest 2
NZ.description: Trick, treat and pick a fight with villianous dental soldiers in Costume Quest 2, the sweet sequel to Double Fine’s hit original, Costume Quest, that turned fans of all ages into candy obsessed crusaders. This inspired RPG adventure includes a range of new features and gameplay improvements to double the amount of mischievous fun. PL.name: Costume Quest 2
PL.description: Trick, treat and pick a fight with villainous dental soldiers in Costume Quest 2, the sweet sequel to Double Fine’s hit original, Costume Quest, that turned fans of all ages into candy obsessed crusaders. This inspired RPG adventure includes a range of new features and gameplay improvements to double the amount of mischievous fun. Explore spooky time-traversing landscapes, don adorable new costumes that transform into powerful Hallo-warriors, and collect even Creepier Treat Cards to wield in combat against a legion of hygiene obsessed baddies. Only heroic siblings Wren and Reynold can save Halloween forever!

PT.name: Costume Quest 2
PT.description: Engana, brinca e arranja lutas com os vis soldados dentários em Costume Quest 2, a doce sequela do original sucesso da Double Fine, Costume Quest, que fez com que fãs de todas as idades ficassem obcecados defensores dos doces. Esta inspirada aventura RPG inclui diversas novas funcionalidades e melhorias a nível de jogabilidade para duplicar a travessa diversão. Explora cenários arrepiantes de ao longo dos tempos, enverga fantásticas peças de vestuário que transformam poderosos guerreiros Hallo e apanha Cartas ainda mais arrepiantes para levares para os combates contra uma legião de mauzões obcecados com higiene. Apenas os heróicos irmãos Wren e Reynold podem salvar o Halloween para sempre!

RU.name: Costume Quest 2
RU.description: Собирай сласти, обходи напасти и сражайся со злобными зубными солдатами в Costume Quest 2, увлекательном продолжении Costume Quest, хита от Double Fine. В этой захватывающей бродилке с элементами RPG тебя ждут новые возможности и улучшения уже известных фишек, которые сделают игру вдвое веселее! Исследуй жуткие пейзажи в разных эпохах, примеряй новые стильные наряды, превращающие недотепу в мегавоина, и собирай еще более жуткие карты, которые помогут выстоять в бою с озабоченными гигиеной плохишами. Только отважным Рен и Рейнольду по силам в очередной раз спасти Хэллоуин!
